mdRecord.dcterms:title: 2000 Rockefeller family holiday card
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rockefeller, John D., IV (John Davison), 1937-
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The 2000 Rockefeller family holiday card reads, "Warmest wishes for a wonderful 1999 holiday season." Pictured are Jay, Sharon, Valerie, John, Emily, Justin, and Charles Rockefeller. On the back is an unofficial seal of the United States Senate.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Christmas cards
Holiday Cards
Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
Rockefeller, Sharon Percy, 1944
mdRecord.dcterms:source: A&M 4050, Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller IV papers, West Virginia & Regional History Center, West Virginia University Libraries
